## Install _simPM_

To install `simPM` on your local machine, please run the following code

```r
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
intall_github("YiFengEDMS/simPM",)
``` 


## R source code 

The source code of this R package is made public on the first author's [Github page](https://github.com/YiFengEDMS/simPM).
